texts:
Business Requirements Document (BRD)
1. Document Control
2. Executive Summary
Brief overview of the business problem, the proposed solution, and the expected benefits.
3. Business Objectives
Improve operational efficiency
Enhance user experience
Reduce processing time
Ensure regulatory compliance
4. Project Scope
In Scope
Features and functionalities that will be delivered.
Out of Scope
Items explicitly excluded from the project.
5. Stakeholders
6. Current State Analysis
Describe the existing system or process and its limitations.
7. Proposed Solution
Outline the new system/process and how it addresses the business problem.
8. Functional Requirements
9. Non-Functional Requirements
10. Assumptions
Users will have access to the required systems
Development team has access to PowerCenter meta

tions
Users will have access to the required systems
Development team has access to PowerCenter metadata
11. Constraints
Budget limitations
Timeline restrictions
Technology stack compatibility
12. Risks
13. Success Criteria
All workflows mapped correctly
Metadata extraction accuracy > 95%
User acceptance testing passed
14. Appendix
Glossary
References
Supporting documents

Business Requirements Document (BRD)
1. Document Control
2. Executive Summary
Brief overview of the business problem, the proposed solution, and the expected benefits.
3. Business Objectives
Improve operational efficiency
Enhance user experience
Reduce processing time
Ensure regulatory compliance
4. Project Scope
In Scope
Features and functionalities that will be delivered.
Out of Scope
Items explicitly excluded from the project.
5. Stakeholders
6. Current State Analysis
Describe the existing system or process and its limitations.
7. Proposed Solution
Outline the new system/process and how it addresses the business problem.
8. Functional Requirements
9. Non-Functional Requirements
10. Assumptions
Users will have access to the required systems
Development team has access to PowerCenter meta

tions

Development team has access to PowerCenter metadata
11. Constraints
Budget limitations
Timeline restrictions
Technology stack compatibility
12. Risks
13. Success Criteria
All workflows mapped correctly
Metadata extraction accuracy > 95%
User acceptance testing passed
